notes: üß† MISSION: Full App Clickable Element Audit & Navigation Validation

üéØ GOAL: Crawl and validate every clickable element on every page and sub-page. Confirm all clickables trigger events, navigation works, and functional actions succeed. No dead links. No missing pages.
‚úÖ PRE-CHECK: Tag and commit current state for rollback.
‚úÖ DO NOT STOP ‚Äî analyze the entire navigation tree, including all sub-pages and dynamic routes, until every clickable passes dry run validation.
‚úÖ Run `npm run lint:fix-all` continuously in background.
üìå CONTEXT: Covers every screen, modal, drawer, settings, onboarding, and dynamic route‚Äîno part of the app is skipped.
üîê RELEVANCE: Prevents functional, navigation, or coverage gaps as app scales; ensures all clickables are type-checked, logic-checked, and properly routed.

before: git commit -m "chore(rollback): checkpoint before clickable crawl"

onReloadHang: Move to background and resume automatically

actions: Enumerate every screen, sub-page, and modal by traversing all navigation definitions and routes in src/navigation/routes.ts, navigation manifests, and dynamic route generators.
For each page and sub-page, enumerate all clickable elements (TouchableOpacity, Pressable, Button, custom touchables, etc.).
Dry run: Simulate click events and log whether event handler is attached and fires.
If clickable is navigation: Dry run navigation (without mutating files), log whether route exists, whether parameters and logic are valid, and flag any broken/dead/missing targets.
If clickable is functional (save, dropdown, collapse, etc.): Dry run action and log outcome.
Generate report: List all issues, dead links, missing pages, and broken logic‚Äî**do not mutate files until review**.
phases.commit: test: clickable element dry run and navigation crawl complete (no mutations)

actions: For all issues found in dry run: For each missing or dead clickable, generate fix, create missing page/component (with placeholder UI and valid route if needed), or repair logic/action.
Link newly created pages/components in navigation tree and all referencing clickables.
Re-crawl all affected pages and retest until dry run passes without issues.
phases.commit: fix: clickable element repair, missing pages/components created and linked

final.commit: chore: clickable audit and navigation crawl finalized; all clickables, routes, and actions validated
notes: All clickables and navigable targets across app and sub-pages are now validated, functional, and type-checked.
Task JSON and full crawl/fix reports moved to /tasks/v1.3.2/ and referenced in tasks/INDEX.md.
actions: update tasks/INDEX.md with crawl results, fixed files, new pages/components, and summary report
